resources.string: We will detect when you shake
We will detect when you fall or shake

string-array.name: shake_events_comments_low_duration
string-array.item: We noticed you were shivering.
Don\'t be nervous, that meeting will be fine.
Its normal to shake a bit.

string-array.name: shake_events_comments_medium_duration
string-array.item: Guess you were testing us.
Milk shake came out well.
Don\'t be hard on us please.

string-array.name: shake_events_comments_high_duration
string-array.item: That was a really thick shake.
Is it normal that you shake too much ?
Were you really making a milk shake ?

string-array.name: fall_detected_messages
string-array.item: Was that an earth quake or did you just fell ?
Our Sensors are gossiping that you fell.
We noticed you fell! are you all right ?
Please watch your step, we noticed you fell.
Are you hurt? We observed you fell.

string-array.name: frequent_fall_messages
string-array.item: Is falling too often a sport?
Are you a panda? cause we noticed you are falling like one.
Are you testing me? Cause I have been tested a million times already.
You seem to be a kid. Please hand over the phone to your mom.
Ouch, that hurts.
Seems like you are angry.

string-array.name: shake_messages
string-array.item: We care for you, please don\'t test our limits. Cause that goes to infinity.
That was a really thick milk shake.
Guess you want to test us.
I wont power up until you actually fall.
I am here to help you, not to play with you.
Guess you need some private time.
I wont tell your mom what you just did.
